Package index

Geocoding

These functions search an address or reference and return coordinates.

geo_address_lookup()
Address lookup API
geo_address_lookup_sf()
Address lookup API in sf format
geo_amenity()
Geocode amenities
geo_amenity_sf()
Geocode amenities in sf format
geo_lite()
Address search API (free-form query)
geo_lite_sf()
Address search API in sf format (free-form query)
geo_lite_struct()
Address search API (structured query)
geo_lite_struct_sf()
Address search API in sf format (structured query)

Reverse geocoding

These functions search coordinates and returns information of places on that coordinates.

reverse_geo_lite()
Reverse geocoding API
reverse_geo_lite_sf()
Reverse geocoding API in sf format

Get spatial objects

These functions return sf objects.

bbox_to_poly()
Coerce a bounding box to a sfc POLYGON object
geo_address_lookup_sf()
Address lookup API in sf format
geo_amenity_sf()
Geocode amenities in sf format
geo_lite_sf()
Address search API in sf format (free-form query)
geo_lite_struct_sf()
Address search API in sf format (structured query)
reverse_geo_lite_sf()
Reverse geocoding API in sf format

Datasets

Helper datasets.

osm_amenities
OpenStreetMap amenity database

About the package

nominatimlite nominatimlite-package
nominatimlite: Interface with 'Nominatim' API Service
